name: Dragons 2D game
description:
I am just learning very basics of game development .

This game was made by 100% following Jason Weimann tutorial on Youtube . 

I know it's not a big 3D game but well I need to learn for months before i can make that . 

I   might just spend most time playing & posting games on youtube : https://www.youtube.com/c/CaffeinatedGamer

I will find some time to also learn more game dev in 3D .
